  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class Worker2WorkerProxy
extends java.lang.Object
implements Worker2Worker, java.rmi.Remote
    Represents a medium through which workers communicate with other workers

    Prakash Chandrasekaran, Gautham Narayanasamy, Vijayaraghavan Subbaiah
